a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Population with basic handwashing facilities, urban vs. rural, 2022
Share of population in urban areas versus rural areas with access to basic handwashing facilities.
Data source: WHO/UNICEF Joint Monitoring Programme for Water Supply, Sanitation and Hygiene (JMP) (2024); HYDE (2023);
